channel.title: EMIS Project Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest EMIS Project news and events.

item.title: Welcome to EMIS
item.description:
We are glad you made it here.

EMIS is a project run by a team of people from various backgrounds, all brought together by the sole purpose to improve the livelihoods of people liveing in areas that have a higher risk of being hit by disasters that disrupt their day to day activities.
